name: Tainted Waters Change Their Shape
description:
This character will not be Frozen, and when their HP does not exceed 5, gains +2 DMG.
After this character uses a Skill: If this character's HP is at least 6, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing standby characters.
descriptionraw: This character will not be Frozen, and when their HP does not exceed 5, gains +2 DMG.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>After this character uses a Skill:</color> If this character's HP is at least 6, deal 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Piercing DMG</color> to all opposing standby characters.
descriptionreplaced: This character will not be Frozen, and when their HP does not exceed 5, gains +2 DMG.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>After this character uses a Skill:</color> If this character's HP is at least 6, deal 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Piercing DMG</color> to all opposing standby characters.
